definitions.text: United States slapstick comedian who played the pompous and overbearing member of the Laurel and Hardy duo who made many films (1892-1957)
having rugged physical strength; inured to fatigue or hardships
examples: proud of her tall stalwart son

definitions.text: able to survive under unfavorable weather conditions
examples: strawberries are hardy and easy to grow
camels are tough and hardy creatures
